Song.title: Gentle Like Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Joel Sczebel & Todd Twining © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Dmaj7 G/D | G/D Em9 | Dmaj7 G/D | G/D :||]
Verse 1: [D]Tenderly You [F#m7]care for me You are [Gmaj7]there for me al[Em9]ways [D]Lovingly You [F#m7]quiet me With the [Gmaj7]comfort of Your [Em9]grace [Em9]Teach me how to [Asus]be [A] [Em9]just like Christ, my [Asus]King [A]
Chorus: [D]Help me be [F#m7]gentle like Jesus For [Em9]He was [Gm]humble [D]Spirit come, [F#m7]soften my heart Help me [Em9]be [Gm]gentle like Jesus [Dmaj7 G/D | G/D Em9 | Dmaj7 G/D | G/D]
Verse 2: [D]Graciously You’ve [F#m7]said to me I must [Gmaj7]not be rude or [Em9]proud [D]Patiently You [F#m7]lead me on Help me [Gmaj7]follow You, my [Em9]God [Em9]Teach me how to [Asus]be [A] [Em9]just like Christ, my [Asus]King [A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 tenderly you care for me you are there for me always lovingly you quiet me with the comfort of your grace teach me how to be just like christ my king chorus help me be gentle like jesus for he was humble spirit come soften my heart help me be gentle like jesus verse 2 graciously youve said to me i must not be rude or proud patiently you lead me on help me follow you my god teach me how to be just like christ my king
